Articles.Content: We should have a new building to test crafts. it would be called "the test hanger"

Hi, and welcome to the game and forums.

If you are suggesting a 'simulator' for checking how stuff files while designing and before committing to launch then yes I'd support that too if it's done well.

You will also find that it has been suggested and discussed quite a lot previously.  Check out the 'common suggestions' thread at the top of this forum, there should be a link to it so you can follow and join in the existing discussions.

Hope this helps.
Use Kerbal Construction Time... if you want to play without the time delay, you can disable that in the settings.
